biotools.summary: Web server for the prediction of phosphorylation sites (P-sites) in proteins. The approach is based on Support Vector Machines trained on sequence profiles enhanced by information from the spatial context of experimentally identified P-sites.

bioschemas.name: Phos3D
bioschemas.summary: Web server for the prediction of phosphorylation sites (P-sites) in proteins. The approach is based on Support Vector Machines trained on sequence profiles enhanced by information from the spatial context of experimentally identified P-sites.
